title: Global pineapple production by leading countries 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Production in thousand metric tons in the y axis.
The maximum Production in thousand metric tons 3418.16 is found at Country Costa Rica and the minimum is found at Colombia where Country is 900.4.
Country Colombia has 3.8 times less Production in thousand metric tons than Country Costa Rica which is the highest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.
Country Costa Rica has the highest Production in thousand metric tons and Colombia has the lowest Production in thousand metric tons.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Production in thousand metric tons in the y axis.
The maximum Production in thousand metric tons 3418.16 is found at Country Costa Rica and the minimum is found at Colombia where Country is 900.4.
Country Colombia has 3.8 times less Production in thousand metric tons than Country Costa Rica which is the highest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.
The Production in thousand metric tons is highest at Country Costa Rica and lowest at Country Colombia.
The lowest value at Country Colombia is 3.8x times less than the highest value at Costa Rica.
Country Costa Rica is higher than any other Countrys with value 3418.16, followed by Philippines, and Brazil. Down to Country Colombia with the lowest value 900.4.
The highest value 3418.16 at Costa Rica is almost 1.75 times larger than the average value 1956.25.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 19562.49.
